What’s been happening to Europe over the last couple of decades, in particular, has been not only the crushing regulation and galloping socialism dictated by unaccountable bureaucrats, or Eurocrats, as they’re called in Brussels, not just this problem of it not being permissible for member nations to control their borders, or have their own immigration policies, which has contributed to the disaster that’s taking place there now — we also have Europeans being prosecuted for speech that the Eurocrats, the Islamists, the trans-national Left deem to be hateful.
If it doesn’t, I think you’re going to see more of this, and it’s going be a triumph for the trans-nationalists, and they’ve got their sights set on us.
